keyword: how many calories in a coors light
title: How Many Calories in a Coors Light?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Coors Light, including carbs, protein, sodium, and comparisons to other beers in this quick nutrition guide.
h1: How Many Calories in a Coors Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can of Coors Light lager beer, chilled, no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by serving size, brand batch, and temperature; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz Coors Light contains 102 calories and 5 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Coors Light bottle?
faqs.a: About 102 kcal for a standard 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Approximately 5 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: It has ~0.9 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Coors Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to Bud Light (110 kcal) but lower than regular beers (140+ kcal).

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Low at ~10 mg per 12 oz serving.
